alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Dukes; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 12:22AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Dukes, southern Barnstable, southern Plymouth, southeastern Bristol and southeastern Newport Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1221 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Falmouth, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. Heavy rain and brief poor drainage street flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Plymouth, Barnstable, Dartmouth, Falmouth, Marion, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Portsmouth, Middletown, Fairhaven, Tiverton, Westport, Duxbury, Mashpee, Kingston and Carver. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Dukes; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
